logicalColumns.name: Avg Supplier Payment Days
logicalColumns.description: This metric computes the average days to pay to the suppliers

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Payments.Total Payment Count
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Payments.Total Payment Days

logicalColumns.name: On Time Payments Count

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 <> 'VOIDED' AND %2 = 'Y' AND %3 <= %4 THEN  CONCAT( CONCAT( CAST (%5 AS VARCHAR ( 38 )), '~'),  CAST (%6 AS VARCHAR ( 38 ))) ELSE  NULL  END

logicalColumns.name: On Time Payment Performance %

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE  CAST (%2 AS DOUBLE PRECISION ) /  CAST (%1 AS DOUBLE PRECISION ) * 100 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Payments.Total Payment Count
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Payments.On Time Payments Count

logicalColumns.name: Overdue Payments Count

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 <> 'VOIDED' AND  IFNULL(%2,  CURRENT_DATE ) > %3 THEN  CONCAT( CONCAT( CAST (%4 AS VARCHAR ( 38 )), '~'),  CAST (%5 AS VARCHAR ( 38 ))) ELSE  NULL  END

logicalColumns.name: Payments Count

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 <> 'VOIDED' THEN %2 ELSE  NULL  END

logicalColumns.name: Total Payment Count
logicalColumns.description: This metric computes Overdue Payments Count + On Time Payments Count.

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Payments.On Time Payments Count
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Payments.Overdue Payments Count

logicalColumns.name: Total Payment Days

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 'Y' AND %2 <> 'VOIDED' THEN  TIMESTAMPDIFF( SQL_TSI_DAY , %3, %4) ELSE 0 END

CASE  WHEN %1 = 'Y' AND %2 IN ('STANDARD', 'AWT', 'QUICKMATCH', 'QUICKDEFAULT', 'PREPAYMENT', 'PAYMENT REQUEST', 'EXPENSE REPORT', 'INTEREST', 'INVOICE REQUEST', 'MIXED', 'CREDIT', 'DEBIT') THEN  TIMESTAMPDIFF( SQL_TSI_DAY , %3, %4) ELSE 0 END

logicalColumns.name: Avg Payment Amount
logicalColumns.description: This metric shows average payment amount memo amount processed for a period (AP Total Payment Amount / AP Payment Count)

logicalColumns.name: Discount Taken Amount

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 'DISCOUNT' AND %2 = 'LIABILITY' THEN %3 ELSE 0 END

aggregateByLevels: logicalLevel:Core.Dim - Payment Accounting Date Fiscal Calendar.Total
logicalLevel:Core.Dim - Distribution Accounting Date Fiscal Calendar.Total

logicalColumns.name: Discount Taken Exchange Loss(Gain) Amount

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 'DISCOUNT' AND %2 IN ('EXCHANGE_GAIN_LOSS', 'GAIN', 'LOSS') THEN %3 ELSE 0 END

aggregateByLevels: logicalLevel:Core.Dim - Payment Accounting Date Fiscal Calendar.Total
logicalLevel:Core.Dim - Distribution Accounting Date Fiscal Calendar.Total

logicalColumns.name: Electronic Payment Amount

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 'EFT' AND %2 = 'CASH' AND %3 IN ('CASH', 'CASH_CLEARING', 'FUTURE_DATED_PMT') THEN %4 * -(1) ELSE 0 END
CASE  WHEN %1 = 'EFT' THEN %2 ELSE 0 END

aggregateByLevels: logicalLevel:Core.Dim - Payment Accounting Date Fiscal Calendar.Total
logicalLevel:Core.Dim - Distribution Accounting Date Fiscal Calendar.Total

logicalColumns.name: Interest Penalties Paid

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 'INTEREST' AND %2 = 'INTEREST_EXPENSE' THEN %3 ELSE 0 END
CASE  WHEN %1 = 'INTEREST' THEN %2 ELSE 0 END

logicalColumns.name: Internal - AP Total Cleared Transaction Amount

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IN ('Y', 'P') AND %2 = 'CASH' AND %3 IN ('CASH', 'CASH_CLEARING', 'FUTURE_DATED_PMT') THEN %4 * -(1) ELSE 0 END
CASE  WHEN %1 IN ('Y', 'P') AND %2 IN ('STANDARD', 'AWT', 'QUICKMATCH', 'QUICKDEFAULT', 'PREPAYMENT', 'PAYMENT REQUEST', 'EXPENSE REPORT', 'INTEREST', 'INVOICE REQUEST', 'MIXED') THEN %3 ELSE 0 END

aggregateByLevels: logicalLevel:Core.Dim - Payment Accounting Date Fiscal Calendar.Total
logicalLevel:Core.Dim - Distribution Accounting Date Fiscal Calendar.Total

logicalColumns.name: Internal - AP Total Payment Days times Amount

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IN ('Y', 'P') AND %2 = 'CASH' AND %3 IN ('CASH', 'CASH_CLEARING', 'FUTURE_DATED_PMT') THEN  TIMESTAMPDIFF( SQL_TSI_DAY , %4, %5) ELSE 0 END  * %6 * -(1)

CASE  WHEN %1 IN ('Y', 'P') AND %2 IN ('STANDARD', 'AWT', 'QUICKMATCH', 'QUICKDEFAULT', 'PREPAYMENT', 'PAYMENT REQUEST', 'EXPENSE REPORT', 'INTEREST', 'INVOICE REQUEST', 'MIXED') THEN  TIMESTAMPDIFF( SQL_TSI_DAY , %3, %4) ELSE 0 END  * %5

aggregateByLevels: logicalLevel:Core.Dim - Payment Accounting Date Fiscal Calendar.Total
logicalLevel:Core.Dim - Distribution Accounting Date Fiscal Calendar.Total

logicalColumns.name: Internal - Payments Liability Amount

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 'CASH' AND %2 = 'LIABILITY' THEN %3 ELSE 0 END

logicalColumns.name: On Time Payments Amount

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 <> 'VOIDED' AND %2 = 'Y' AND %3 <= %4 AND %5 = 'CASH' AND %6 IN ('CASH', 'CASH_CLEARING', 'FUTURE_DATED_PMT') THEN %7 * -(1) ELSE 0 END
CASE  WHEN %1 = 'Y' AND %2 <= %3 THEN %4 ELSE 0 END

aggregateByLevels: logicalLevel:Core.Dim - Payment Accounting Date Fiscal Calendar.Total
logicalLevel:Core.Dim - Distribution Accounting Date Fiscal Calendar.Total

logicalColumns.name: Overdue Payments Amount

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 <> 'VOIDED' AND  IFNULL(%2,  CURRENT_DATE ) > %3 AND %4 = 'CASH' AND %5 IN ('CASH', 'CASH_CLEARING', 'FUTURE_DATED_PMT') THEN %6 * -(1) ELSE 0 END
CASE  WHEN %1 > %2 THEN %3 ELSE 0 END

aggregateByLevels: logicalLevel:Core.Dim - Payment Accounting Date Fiscal Calendar.Total
logicalLevel:Core.Dim - Distribution Accounting Date Fiscal Calendar.Total

logicalColumns.name: Payments Amount

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 'CASH' AND %2 IN ('CASH', 'CASH_CLEARING', 'FUTURE_DATED_PMT') THEN %3 * -(1) ELSE 0 END

aggregateByLevels: logicalLevel:Core.Dim - Payment Accounting Date Fiscal Calendar.Total
logicalLevel:Core.Dim - Distribution Accounting Date Fiscal Calendar.Total

logicalColumns.name: Payment Distribution Amount
Payment Exchange Loss(Gain) Amount

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 'CASH' AND %2 IN ('EXCHANGE_GAIN_LOSS', 'GAIN', 'LOSS') THEN %3 ELSE 0 END

aggregateByLevels: logicalLevel:Core.Dim - Payment Accounting Date Fiscal Calendar.Total
logicalLevel:Core.Dim - Distribution Accounting Date Fiscal Calendar.Total

logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Payments.Internal - AP Total Payment Days times Amount

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 <> 0 THEN %2 / %1 * 100 ELSE  NULL  END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Payments.Interest Penalties Paid

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 <> 0 THEN %2 / %1 * 100 ELSE  NULL  END
